title: Manage a Management of Change (MOC) Request
description: An engineer proposes changing a pipe's material of construction. An MOC must be created to assess the safety and environmental impact.

tasks.description: Create a new MOC request, detailing the proposed change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates the MOC record.

tasks.description: Route the MOC to the EHS department for a formal hazard review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns the MOC to the EHS manager for review and approval.

tasks.description: After EHS review, document any required safety actions (e.g., 'Update P&ID diagram') before the MOC can be fully approved.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent adds the required actions to the MOC record based on the EHS review.
